trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert 32-bit signed integer objects to and from data source control cache duration representations.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conversor de tipo para converter objetos de inteiro de 32 bits de e para representações de duração de cache de controle do dados fonte.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET data source controls that support caching typically provide a `CacheDuration` property that you can set to the number of seconds that the control caches data.
trans-unit.target: Controles de fonte de dados do ASP.NET que oferecem suporte a cache normalmente fornecem um `CacheDuration` propriedade que você pode definir o número de segundos que o controle armazena dados em cache.

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents "Infinite" in these caching contexts, and the DataSourceCacheDurationConverter class takes care of this explicit conversion.
trans-unit.target: O valor 0 representa "Infinito" nesses contextos de cache e a classe DataSourceCacheDurationConverter cuida essa conversão explícita.

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not use the DataSourceCacheDurationConverter class.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de páginas não usam a classe DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.

trans-unit.source: Control developers who are developing data source controls that support caching use this type converter along with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute to decorate a property that represents a cache duration setting of a custom data source control.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de controle que estão desenvolvendo controles de fonte de dados que oferecem suporte a cache usam este conversor de tipo junto com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>atributo para decorar uma propriedade que representa uma configuração de duração do cache de um controle de fonte de dados personalizados.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> can convert an object in the given source type to an <xref:System.Int32> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> pode converter um objeto no tipo de origem especificado para um <xref:System.Int32>objeto.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> class explicitly handles `string` types.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>classe manipula explicitamente `string` tipos.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it calls on its base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, to make the determination.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele chama em sua classe base, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, para tornar a determinação.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents a type that the converter converts.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa um tipo que converte o conversor.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esse conversor puder realizar a operação. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> instance can convert an object to the given destination type.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> instância pode converter um objeto para o tipo de destino específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> explicitly handles conversion to `string` and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> types.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>explicitamente lida com a conversão em `string` e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>tipos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it calls on its base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, to make the determination.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele chama em sua classe base, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, para tornar a determinação.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to which you want to convert.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo para o qual você deseja converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esse conversor puder realizar a operação. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to an <xref:System.Int32> object.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto especificado em um <xref:System.Int32>objeto.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The ConvertFrom method converts an <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> string or the string "Infinite" to the value 0.
trans-unit.target: O método ConvertFrom converte um <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>cadeia de caracteres ou a cadeia de caracteres "Infinito" para o valor 0.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Other values are handled by the base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.
trans-unit.target: Outros valores são tratados pela classe base, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture in which to represent the number.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>que especifica a cultura representar o número.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o valor convertido.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed in the value parameter, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é passado no parâmetro de valor, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é retornado.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to another type.
trans-unit.target: Converte o objeto especificado em outro tipo.

trans-unit.source: The ConvertTo method converts a valid value of 0 to the string "Infinite".
trans-unit.target: O método ConvertTo converte um valor válido de 0 para a cadeia de caracteres "Infinito".

trans-unit.source: Other values are handled by the base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.
trans-unit.target: Outros valores são tratados pela classe base, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture in which to represent the number.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>que especifica a cultura representar o número.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para converter o objeto.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o valor convertido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of standard values for the data type the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> instance is designed for.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de valores padrão para o tipo de dados de <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> se destina a instância.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that contains 0 for cache duration, which represents "Infinite".
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>que contém 0 para a duração do cache, que representa "Infinito".</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the collection of standard values returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se a coleção de valores padrão retornada do <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues*>método é uma lista exclusiva, usando o contexto especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> class always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> collection returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is not an exhaustive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>classe sempre retorna `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>coleção retornada do <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>método não é uma lista completa de valores possíveis.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"> </xref> objeto oferece suporte a um conjunto padrão de valores que podem ser escolhidos em uma lista, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> object always returns `true` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method should be called to find a common set of values the converter supports.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>objeto sempre retorna `true` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>método deve ser chamado para encontrar o conversor de um conjunto comum de valores suporta.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formatação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.
